Name: NekoDice
About the game: A software for vtubers (Live2D). Built-in link system. Supports iOS face capture (Use Shiori). Built-in high performance face capture, let your model become more accurate. Built-in Gift system supports Bilibili(Built-in). Also supports more face params like ParamMouthU, ParamMouthTongue(ParamMouthT). More body params like ParamBodyX, ParamBodyY, ParamBodyZ.
Meta Title: NekoDice: Jun 24, 2021, Anigen Media Group and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on NekoDice? Check out the release date (Jun 24, 2021), developer insights from Anigen Media Group, and a complete game summary.
